import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { return (

Welcome to the E-commerce App

Choose any of the following options

Product Catalog

Browse and manage our product catalog.

View Products

Order Management

Place and track your orders.

Manage Orders

Inventory Management

Check stock levels and availability.

View Inventory

Shipping & Handling

Learn about our shipping and handling services.

Shipping Options

Profile Management

Manage your profile settings and information.

Manage Profile

Contact Us

Get in touch with our support team.

Contact Support
); }; export default Home;
